channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:44 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 🔴 17:44 Air alarm to Zaporizhzhya Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
